name: Carbon OUt
description:
Mini Jam 36 Entry 

Theme: Nature
Limitation : 3 Color

Story:
Humans failed to protect the environment. Trees have been cut down and air pollution swarmed our atmosphere.

However, an unknown scientist discovered a way to help our planet by producing oxygen and reducing carbon dioxide at the same time.

Now, you are tasked to carry out this mission by slicing the carbon dioxide like a fruit to remove the carbon and produce a happy oxygen.

Don't let a single carbon dioxide escape!!

Game Mechanics

Click and Drag your mouse to Slice (you play fruit ninja right?)

I would like to hear your thoughts :)
